page.title: 12Crops near Sandhills
page.content: There are a lot of crops growing in our area.There are fields of wheat,barley,corn,oats and potatoes. Near Holton Wood the deer like digging up new potatoes and wheat. Because of this about 10 dear are killed a year. Some fields have grass with cows grazing. Rectory Farm farm near Stanton st John has a pick your own fruit farm.You can pick :Strawberries,Rasberries,goseberries, blackberries,new potatoes and beans. people from Oxford and the villages in the area come to pick the fruit and vegtables. The farms near Stanton St John are owned by New College Oxford and the farms near Forest Hill and Holton are owned by Shotover Estates.
